001package net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns.Strategy;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.model.EstimationFunction;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.NeuralNetwork;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.NeuralNetworks;
008import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.ObjectiveFunction;
009import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.Optimizer;
010import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.Regime;
011
012/**
013 * A {@link Regime} decorator that dumps the internal node activations of a
014 * {@link NeuralNetwork} before and/or after each training epoch.
015 *
016 * <p>This regime is typically used for debugging and inspection. It wraps
017 * another regime, delegates the actual training to it, and uses
018 * {@link NeuralNetworks#dump(NeuralNetwork, boolean)} to output the state of
019 * the network. The dump can optionally include input nodes.</p>
020 *
021 * <h3>Behavior</h3>
022 * <ul>
023 *   <li>If {@code firstTime} is true, the network is dumped once before the
024 *   first training step.</li>
025 *   <li>The network is always dumped after each delegated training epoch.</li>
026 *   <li>If {@code includeInputs} is true, input node values are included in the
027 *   dump; otherwise only hidden and output nodes are dumped.</li>
028 * </ul>
029 *
030 * @see NeuralNetworks#dump(NeuralNetwork, boolean)
031 * @see DelegatedRegime
032 */
033@Strategy(Strategy.Role.CONCRETE)
034public class DumpNodesRegime extends DelegatedRegime {
035
036    /**
037     * The hyperparameter name to dump first time
038     */
039    public static final String HP_DUMP_FIRST_TIME = "dumpFirstTime";
040    /**
041     * The hyperparameter name to dump inputs
042     */
043    public static final String HP_DUMP_INPUTS = "dumpInputs";
044
045    /**
046     * Creates a new regime that dumps node values of the given network during training.
047     *
048     * @param regime        the underlying regime to delegate training to
049     * @param firstTime     if true, the network is dumped once before training begins
050     * @param includeInputs if true, input nodes are included in the dump
051     */
052    public DumpNodesRegime(Regime regime, boolean firstTime, boolean includeInputs) {
053        super(regime);
054        setHyperparameter(HP_DUMP_FIRST_TIME, firstTime);
055        setHyperparameter(HP_DUMP_INPUTS, includeInputs);
056    }
057
058    /**
059     * Returns whether the network will be dumped once before training starts.
060     *
061     * @return {@code true} if the network is dumped before the first epoch, otherwise {@code false}
062     */
063    public boolean isFirstTime() {
064        return getHyperparameter(HP_DUMP_FIRST_TIME, Boolean.class);
065    }
066
067    /**
068     * Sets whether the network should be dumped before training begins.
069     *
070     * @param firstTime {@code true} to dump before the first epoch, {@code false} otherwise
071     */
072    public void setFirstTime(boolean firstTime) {
073        setHyperparameter(HP_DUMP_FIRST_TIME, firstTime);
074    }
075
076    /**
077     * Returns whether input nodes are included in the dump.
078     *
079     * @return {@code true} if input nodes are included, {@code false} otherwise
080     */
081    public boolean isIncludeInputs() {
082        return getHyperparameter(HP_DUMP_INPUTS, Boolean.class);
083    }
084
085    /**
086     * Sets whether to include input nodes in the dump.
087     *
088     * @param includeInputs {@code true} to include input nodes, {@code false} otherwise
089     */
090    public void setIncludeInputs(boolean includeInputs) {
091        setHyperparameter(HP_DUMP_INPUTS, includeInputs);
092    }
093
094    /**
095     * Trains the given estimation function with the wrapped regime and dumps the
096     * network nodes before and/or after training.
097     * <p>
098     * If the estimation function is a {@link NeuralNetwork}, its nodes are
099     * printed using {@link NeuralNetworks#dump(NeuralNetwork, boolean)}.
100     * </p>
101     *
102     * @param estimationFunction the model to train (only {@link NeuralNetwork} is dumped)
103     * @param trainingSet        the dataset to train on
104     * @param objective          the objective (loss) function
105     * @param optimizer          the optimizer to apply updates
106     * @param <E>                the type of estimation function
107     */
108    @Override
109    public <E extends EstimationFunction> void train(E estimationFunction, DataSet trainingSet, ObjectiveFunction objective, Optimizer<? super E> optimizer) {
110        if (isFirstTime()) {
111            dumpNodes(estimationFunction);
112        }
113        regime.train(estimationFunction, trainingSet, objective, optimizer);
114        dumpNodes(estimationFunction);
115    }
116
117    private void dumpNodes(EstimationFunction estimationFunction) {
118        if (estimationFunction instanceof NeuralNetwork neuralNetwork) {
119            NeuralNetworks.dump(neuralNetwork, isIncludeInputs());
120        }
121    }
122}
